description: What a perfect spot! Nestled in between 3 parks and 2 elementary schools, this Citadel Heights location can't be beat. Duplex style level entry main floor with semi private yard & 3 generous size beds, an open den and 2 baths up. Bright, fresh and clean, with plenty of windows, 9' ceiling in living area and vaulted foyer. Laminate, carpet & gas fireplace. Tons of storage here! Ultra quiet location on no thru lane in complex. Two separate garages + driveway parking,visitor parking steps away!
